title: Microenvironmental Th9 and Th17 lymphocytes induce metastatic spreading in lung cancer
abstract: Microenvironmental Th9 and Th17 lymphocytes induce metastatic spreading in lung cancer Ylia Salazar Xiang Zheng David Brunn Hartmann Raifer Felix Picard Yajuan Zhang Hauke Winter Stefan Guenther Andreas Weigert Benno Weigmann Laure Dumoutier Jean-Christophe Renauld Ari Waisman Anja Schmall Amanda Tufman Ludger Fink Bernhard Brüne Tobias Bopp Friedrich Grimminger Werner Seeger Soni Savai Pullamsetti Magdalena Huber Rajkumar Savai
